alert.note: Alert for Avery; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Yancey (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 03 at 2:52AM EST until March 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Avery, Yancey, Mitchell, and mountain portions of Caldwell, Burke, and McDowell Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Avery; Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Yancey
